DOC.brief_summary: Prospective , multi-center , randomize , control pilot study demonstrate safety effectiveness VGS Fluent external support device , support saphenous vein grafts patient coronary heart disease .
DOC.criteria: Primary 1 . Patient schedule onpump CABG clinical ground 2 . Vein graft indicate right circumflex coronary artery LIMA indicate LAD clinical ground 3 . Native circumflex right coronary artery least one stenosis vessel > 75 % Primary 1 . Concomitant nonCABG cardiac procedure 2 . Prior peripheral vascular cardiac surgery 3 . Emergency CABG surgery ( cardiogenic shock , inotrophic pressure support , IABP )
